item.content:
Open Challenge

This event would be an open platform for all the budding engineers, scientists, and researchers who can come up with their innovative designs and implementations in the field of robotics and exhibit them in front of our elite panel and explain the working of their machines. The participants would be judged on the basis of their innovation, implementation and demonstration.

ROBOTS PER EVENT :One
LENGTH OF EVENT :Open
ROBOT WEIGHT RANGE :Open
ROBOT DIMENTIONS :Open
ARENA SPECIFICATIONS :None
ROBOT CONTROLS :Autonomous or remote control
ENGINEERING PRINCIPLES :Art, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, computer science, etc
EVENT SUMMARY :This is the anything goes category. For people with cool robots that don't fit into any category.
